headline: Patient Monitoring Devices Market to be Worth $118.21 Billion by 2033 at CAGR of 10.21% - Grand View Research, Inc.
summary: The global patient monitoring devices market size is expected to reach USD 118.21 billion by 2033, registering a CAGR of 10.21% from 2025 to 2033, according to a new report by Grand View Research, Inc. This expansion is fundamentally driven by the increasing need to measure and display vital biometric data. This demand stems from three primary factors: the growing geriatric population and rising prevalence of chronic conditions like cardiovascular disease and diabetes, which require continuous m
